hp.special: equal the beast’s Constitution modifier + your Wisdom modifier + five times your ranger level (the beast has a number of Hit Dice [d8s] equal to your ranger level)

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The beast doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy’s reach.

trait.name: Primal Rebirth
entries: If the beast has died within the last hour, you can use your action to touch it and expend a spell slot of 1st level or higher. The beast returns to life after 1 minute with all its hit points restored.

trait.name: Ready Companion
entries: As a bonus action, you can command the beast to make its shred attack or to Hide.

action.name: Shred
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

hp.special: equal the beast’s Constitution modifier + your Wisdom modifier + four times your ranger level (the beast has a number of Hit Dice [d6s] equal to your ranger level)

trait.name: Adapted
entries: The beast gains a climb or swim speed (your choice) of 40ft. when you bond with it.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the beast moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a maul attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra {@dice 1d6} slashing damage. The DC equals your spell save DC. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength saving throw against your spell save DC or be knocked prone

trait.name: Primal Rebirth
entries: If the beast has died within the last hour, you can use your action to touch it and expend a spell slot of 1st level or higher. The beast returns to life after 1 minute with all its hit points restored.

trait.name: Ready Companion
entries: As a bonus action, you can command the beast to make its maul attack or to Hide.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

monster.name: Artificer's Golem
languages: Understands creator’s languages, but cannot speak

trait.name: Bound
entries: The golem is magically bound to its creator. As long as the creator and it are on the same plane of existence, the creator can telepathically call the golem to travel to it, and the golem knows the distance and direction to its creator.

trait.name: Clinging Nuisance
entries: The celestial monkey can grapple any creature that is Large or smaller. If the grappled target is a Large or Medium creature, the target's speed is halved instead of being reduced to 0. While a creature is grappled by the celestial monkey, the grappled target has disadvantage on attack rolls as well as Constitution saving throws made to maintain concentration.

trait.name: Evasive Strikes
entries: When the celestial monkey makes a melee attack against a creature, it doesn't provoke opportunity attacks from that creature for the rest of the turn, whether it hits or not.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The celestial monkey has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Swift Distraction
entries: The celestial monkey can take the Help action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The celestial monkey's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the kojaku fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The kojaku has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The kojaku's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Primate Telepathy
entries: The kojaku can magically command any primate within 1 mile of it, using a limited telepathy.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The kojaku's long jump is up to 60 feet and its high jump is up to 30 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kojaku makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its fists. It can use its staff in place of one fist attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d6 + 9}) piercing damage.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 25 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d8 + 9}) bludgeoning damage plus {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Primate Call
entries: The dragon magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating no higher than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the dragon's choice).

In a new form, the dragon retains its alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, lair actions, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. Its statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The kojaku's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 24}). The kojaku can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

legendary.name: Bite
entries: The kojaku makes one bite attack.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The kojaku moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Dazzling Leap (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The kojaku jumps up to half its speed and plants its staff on the ground where it lands. If it lands in a space that contains one or more other creatures, each of those creatures must make a DC 24 Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice). On a failure, a target is knocked prone and takes {@h}16 {@damage 2d6+9} bludgeoning damage plus {@h}17 {@damage 2d8+8} radiant damage. On a success, a target takes only half damage, isn't knocked prone, and is pushed out of the kojaku's space into an unoccupied space of the target's choice that is within 5 feet of the kojaku. If no unoccupied space is within range, the target instead falls prone in the kojaku's space.

legendary.name: Ground Pound (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The kojaku attempts to grapple one creature within 5 feet of it that is prone. If the grapple is successful or the prone target is already grappled, the kojaku makes {@dice 1d4} fist attacks against the target.

hp.special: equal the Brandaev’s Constitution modifier + your Charisma modifier + six times your character level (Brandaev has a number of Hit Dice [d10s] equal to your character level)

trait.name: Borrowed Strength
entries: Brandaev draws strength from the creature that attuned to the coin, and grows in strength alongside them. When the coin is attuned to a new master, or when her master's proficiency bonus changes, Brandaev's attributes and abilities change with her master's by changing her proficiency bonus of +2 to the master's proficiency bonus. This affects her proficient saves and skills, her spell attack and save DC, her attack bonus and the DC of her Flaming Breath. Lastly, Brandaev's Flaming Breath deals prof x 1d10 fire damage.

trait.name: Ice Cold Vengeance
entries: When Brandaev takes cold damage, her Flaming Breath automatically recharges.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Brandaev's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Brandaev has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Brandaev makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Flaming Breath {@recharge 6}
entries: Brandaev exhales scorching wind in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw, taking 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Brandaev's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). Brandaev can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

hp.special: equal the Brandaev’s Constitution modifier + your Charisma modifier + six times your character level (Brandaev has a number of Hit Dice [d10s] equal to your character level)

trait.name: Borrowed Strength
entries: Brandaev draws strength from the creature that attuned to the coin, and grows in strength alongside them. When the coin is attuned to a new master, or when her master's proficiency bonus changes, Brandaev's attributes and abilities change with her master's by changing her proficiency bonus of +2 to the master's proficiency bonus. This affects her proficient saves and skills, her spell attack and save DC, her attack bonus and the DC of her Flaming Breath. Lastly, Brandaev's Flaming Breath deals 2d10 + prof x 1d10 fire damage.

trait.name: Ice Cold Vengeance
entries: When Brandaev takes cold damage, her Flaming Breath automatically recharges.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Brandaev's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Brandaev has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Brandaev makes three claw attacks or a bite attack and a claw attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d6 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Flaming Breath {@recharge 6}
entries: Brandaev exhales scorching wind in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Brandaev's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). Brandaev can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

hp.special: equal the Brandaev’s Constitution modifier + your Charisma modifier + six times your character level (Brandaev has a number of Hit Dice [d10s] equal to your character level)

trait.name: Borrowed Strength
entries: Brandaev draws strength from the creature that attuned to the coin, and grows in strength alongside them. When the coin is attuned to a new master, or when her master's proficiency bonus changes, Brandaev's attributes and abilities change with her master's by changing her proficiency bonus of +2 to the master's proficiency bonus. This affects her proficient saves and skills, her spell attack and save DC, her attack bonus and the DC of her Flaming Breath. Lastly, Brandaev's Flaming Breath deals 4d10 + prof x 1d10 fire damage.

trait.name: Ice Cold Vengeance
entries: When Brandaev takes cold damage, her Flaming Breath automatically recharges.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Brandaev's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Brandaev has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Brandaev makes a bite attack and three claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d8 + 8}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d6 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Flaming Breath {@recharge 6}
entries: Brandaev exhales scorching wind in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw, taking 33 ({@damage 6d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Brandaev's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). Brandaev can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monster.name: Snow Cactus
senses: tremorsense 60 ft. (blind to anything not detected by tremorsense)

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The snow cactus can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The snow cactus has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the snow cactus's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Thrust
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) acid damage.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The black leviathan can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The leviathan can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the black leviathan fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Bloodied Rage
entries: When the black leviathan drops under half its maximum hit points (184) it immediately recharges and uses its Acid Gloom followed by its Vitriolic Spray. If the triggering creature is within range the leviathan will center the attacks on that creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The black leviathan can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its stinger.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the leviathan. A swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the leviathan, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the leviathan's turns.

If the leviathan takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the leviathan must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the leviathan. If the leviathan dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tail Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 20 ft., one creature. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Acid Spit
entries: The black leviathan spits a glob of acid at one creature within 90 feet. The target must make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw taking 31 ({@damage 7d8}) acid damage on a failure and nonmagical armor worn by the target is partly dissolved and takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10, or taking half as much damage on a sucessful save.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the leviathan's choice that is within 120 feet of the leviathan and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the leviathan's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Vitriolic Spray
entries: The leviathan exhales acid in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) acid damage and being {@condition blinded} for 1 minute on a failed save, or half as much damage and not being blinded on a successful one. A creature that is blinded can use its action to wash its eyes, if it has access to fresh, clean water, to end the effect early.

action.name: Acid Gloom {@recharge 4}
entries: Magical darkness spreads from a point the leviathan chooses within 60 feet to fill a 25-foot radius sphere for up to 10 minutes. The leviathan must hold concentration on this effect as though concentrating on a spell. The darkness spreads around corners. A creature with darkvision can't see through this darkness and nonmagical light can't illuminate it. If the point the leviathan chooses is on an object, that the leviathan is holding or one that isn't being worn or carried, the darkness emanates from the object and moves with it. If any of this effect's area overlaps with an area of light created by a spell of 5th level or lower, the spell that created the light is dispelled. Any creature that enters the area for the first time or starts its turn in the area must make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The leviathan makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Acid Spit
entries: The leviathan uses its acid spit.

legendary.name: Tail Slash (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The leviathan slashes its tail. Each creature within 15 feet of the leviathan must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The leviathan can then burrow up to half its burrowing speed.
